summary: Premium tier website for Abilene Downtown Antique Mall showcasing high‑quality visuals, immersive parallax and scroll‑triggered animations, a comprehensive dealer and inventory catalog, a full‑screen gallery, event calendar with RSVP, SEO‑optimized blog, FAQs accordion, and dynamic contact form with Mailchimp integration. The site adopts a warm earthy palette, handcrafted serif typography, subtle micro‑interactions, and mobile‑first responsive design, ensuring an engaging, accessible experience across devices.
